gnat.representation
Class Text

java.lang.Object
  gnat.representation.Text

public class Text
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a text object, with source text, text context model, and annotations.

TODO: each annotation should alter the text context model! For instance, a new GO term was annotated, then the context vector for GO terms/codes should be adapted. Or, a gene was annotated (with a high confidence), than this should be added as (potential) interaction partners. Or, a locations (chromosomal or subcellular) was identified, then this should be added to the context vector that represents this type of annotations. This improves the comparison of (gene) context against this text's context (more precise annotations).

Author:
Joerg Hakenberg

public int lengthInTokens()
Returns the (approximate) length of the text in tokens. Splits at every single white space and returns the number of elements generated that way.

getSentenceAround

public java.lang.String getSentenceAround(int position)
Returns the sentence that contains the given position.
If the hits a sentence boundary, returns the sentence before the given position. If the position hits a white space after a sentence boundary, returns the sentence following the position.
Returns the sentence including the end mark.

Parameters:
position -
Returns:

index2sid

public int index2sid(int index)
Returns the sentence ID for the given index position of a sentence. If the index is negative, returns the i-th last sentence (-1 returns the last, -2 the pre-last, and so on).

Parameters:
index -
Returns:
